sessions.title: Introduction
subjects: VWW Welcome w/ Tiff or Rachel
Ice Breaker - Getting to know you
Course overview (PP on web and languages), Group Rules, Goals, Expectations
Goal setting - what do you hope to get out of the program - what kind of job are you looking for?
assignments: Prep for Saturday - Create a gmail and google docs account, create a folder to store your assignments named 'Firstname Lastname - Step Up IT' (example: 'Jenny Beaudin - Step Up IT') and share it with the VWW account (TODO: Fill in email)

sessions.title: Women in IT Panel & Computer Setup
subjects: Computer set-up and installing programs (text editor, HTML, CSS, JS, other), intro to Pluralsight, Code Academy, Gmail accounts, Google docs
Women in IT Panel Discussion & Jobs in IT in Vermont (how you got to where you are and how self esteem plays a role) (5-6 total)
assignments: Look around and familiarize with Pluralsight and Code Academy
Pluralsight module on CSS and HTML

sessions.title: Computer Anatomy
subjects: Computer Anatomy & Terminology: Operating Systems, Software, Malware
Operating Systems: Windows, Mac OS, Linux, Android/iOS

sessions.title: Introduction to HTML (Hypertext Markup Language)
subjects: Introduction to HTML: Tags and Attributes
HTML Document Structure: html, head and body tags
HTML for Content: Headings, Paragraphs, Emphasis, Lists, Links and Images
HTML for Structure: Sections and articles
labs: Exploring HTML source code with Chrome Developer Tools
assignments: Complete HTML conversion of Resume content

sessions.title: Online Etiquette and Social Media
subjects: Email etiquette, cleaning up social media, resume review

sessions.title: Decisionmaking and Problem Solving
subjects: Troubleshooting & Tech Support: Asking the right questions
labs: Submitting a clear bug report with steps to reproduce

sessions.title: Introduction to CSS (Cascading Style Sheets)
subjects: Introduction to CSS: Properties + Values = Rules
CSS for Typography: Font/text properties, Web fonts, links (hover/visited/hover/active)
labs: Attaching a stylesheet with the link tag
Exploring CSS styles with Chrome Developer Tools

sessions.title: Introduction to Databases & SQL
subjects: Introduction to Relational Databases (RDBMS): Tables and columns
SQL (Structured Query Language): Filtering data based on criteria
Other Datastores: Document Databases (Mongo), Search Engines (Elasticsearch)

sessions.title: Images & Photoshop
subjects: Optimizing Images for the web and print
Raster Image Formats: JPG and PNG
Vector Image Formats: EPS and SVG
assignments: Follow up on barriers and self esteem exercise

sessions.title: HTML & CSS for Layout
subjects: HTML Tags for Layout: div, header, footer, nav and main
CSS: Floats for Multi Column Layout
labs: Utility classes for content images (left, right, center)
Create a three column layout of 3 products with images floats
Create a fixed header with positioning
Add product titles with relative and absolute positioning

sessions.title: Version Control with Git
subjects: Introduction to Git: Staging and commiting changes
Introduction to Github: Adding a remote and pushing your changes

sessions.title: CSS Background Images and Effects
subjects: CSS3 Effects: Text/Drop Shadow, Gradients, Rounded Corners
labs: CSS Buttons with Background Images and Sprites

subjects: Failure (how that ties into self esteem)
Networking, project review and problem solving, employment support
Networking, project review and problem solving, employment support
Networking, project review and problem solving, employment support
Networking, project review and problem solving, employment support
